name: 3D Super Car Race PRO - Ful Illegal Street Racing Version
name_original: 3D Super Car Race PRO - Ful Illegal Street Racing Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready for an amazing, adrenaline rush car racing game, where you get to get behind the wheel of a supercar! Zoom your way through the streets, as you try to avoid an onslaught of traffic!

- 3D graphics!.
- Easy controls.
- Amazing sound track.
